.xyz file format:
min point of bounding box: x y z
max point of bounding box: x y z
kernel radius: radius
particle radius: radius
particle mass: mass
particles' positions and densities:
x y z density


for example:
-0.04 -0.04 -0.04
3.04 2.04 1.54
0.036
0.01
0.00403914
0.0199628 0.02 0.0199924 429.723
0.0397894 0.0199325 0.02 577.938
0.0598905 0.02 0.0199746 587.701
0.0799356 0.02 0.0199719 591.818
0.0999644 0.02 0.0199709 594.787
0.119978 0.02 0.0199695 596.445
0.139987 0.02 0.0199687 597.548
0.159992 0.02 0.0199681 598.255
0.179995 0.02 0.0199676 598.721
0.199997 0.02 0.0199673 599.019
0.219998 0.02 0.0199671 599.201
0.239999 0.02 0.019967 599.297
......
